name: Protect The Cheese
description:
This game is a simple game made by firecity 7 but this game is not perfect at all so this game is still under development, you should understand that firecity7 studio is new in the world of game. so i will learn about programming from The Beginning to end, about this game this game just shooting the enemy and protect your own cheese, story is about 
there is a small animal, a rat who is starving, because there is no food around it finally the mouse goes to a large cheese factory
The mouse took a large cheese from the cheese factory.
the mouse brought the cheese to his house
when he arrived at his house suddenly there were ants blocking his journey to the house.
The ant want to eat the big cheese
the mouse thought "how to fight this many ants?" finally the mouse remembered that he was carrying a gun.
ants and rats are fighting for the big cheese (1 vs Many)

Please comment down below 

what features we gonna add it

In development [MAY HAVE SOME BUG AND FAIL LOAD]
